item.title: HTB Monitortwo

item.title: Deadsec 2023
item.description: xee1 category: web solution From the title you can tell this is a classic xxe challenge , when you capture the login request in burp repeater you will realize that the username is echoed out , so we have to make sure the output of our xxe payload is reflected in the page through the user name field. I crafted a payload to read /flag.txt , we also need to pass it through a php filter , we get the flag in base64 format
